title: Terms of Use
intro: Thank you for using Deorum, a web application created by Azgaar and the Team. Please review the following terms of use.

clause1.title: Pre-created Characters
clause1.content: Deorum provides pre-created fantasy characters created by Azgaar and the Team. You are free to use and edit the pre-created characters for non-commercial purposes under the terms of the CC BY-NC 4.0 license.

subclauses.subclause1: All character portraits in Deorum are pre-created using curated Stable Diffusion image-to-image AI generation. The generation is based on a set of hand-drawn unique portraits created by Azgaar and the Team, so all generated portraits are derivatives of the source images. As such, Azgaar retains all rights to the source images. However, the derivatives of these portraits (which are Deorum pre-created character portraits) are available for free for non-commercial usage.
subclauses.subclause2: The character biographies in Deorum are generated using OpenAI GPT-3 and GPT-4 models, which are then manually tuned by Azgaar and the Team. All text content, including character biographies and other character-related information, is also available for free for non-commercial usage.
subclauses.subclause3: For commercial use of pre-created characters or their parts, please contact Azgaar via email at azgaar.fmg@yandex.com. We will be happy to grant permissions for commercial usage for our supporters.
